title: Forecast Janna Joke Glitch
body:
When playing with the **Forecast Janna skin** when you do her **joke** it not only does the joke for that skin it also does her normal skin voice joke as well. 
So instead of only hearing the one joke you hear TWO JANNAS AT ONCE TELLING TWO DIFFERENT JOKES. AHH. THE TILT.

I was told on twitter by riot support to post the glitch I found here. I included the video I took that shows the glitch happening.

replies.body: Same goes for infernal nasus. Thought i was razy
It appears to be occurring when a champion has special VO, as opposed to base. The team's working on sorting this out.

Thanks for the report! :D 

We're aware of the issue and are working to resolve this!
